title: Prime Day Apple deals: We found 19 record-low prices on AirPods, iPads & Apple Watch
description: The best Prime Day Apple deals of 2025 include record-low prices on AirPods, Apple Watch Series 10, iPads, and MacBooks.
excerpt: If you need new AirPods, a MacBook, or an iPad, then we have very good news.
text: Credit: Mashable Photo Composite / Apple / Ian Moore Table of Contents The best Prime Day Apple deals at a glance: Happy Prime Day!While Amazon sales don't always live up to the hype, for Prime Day 2025, Amazon went hard. Mashable Deals For Apple fans, we have a can't-miss AirPods Prime Day deal. Even with the many noise-cancelling earbuds options on the market, the AirPods Pro remain one of the best choices for folks in the Apple ecosystem. The quick pairing can't be beat, and they are a true plug-and-play option (especially because they don't come with a companion app). The noise cancelling is some of the best you'll find on earbuds, alongside its excellent audio. Mashable's Stan Schroeder gave these earbuds a 4.1/5 in his review, noting that he'd be likely to take them on a plane over over-ear headphones, and writing of their sound "[they] did an equally good job with complex jazz performances and very heavy guitar tunes."More AirPods dealsApple AirPods 4 â€” $89 $129 (save $40) ðŸ”¥Apple AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation â€” $119 $179 (save $60) ðŸ”¥Apple AirPods Pro 2 â€” $149 $249 (save $100) ðŸ”¥Apple AirPods Max (Lightning) â€” $398 $549 (save $151)Apple AirPods Max (USB-C) â€” $429 $549 (save $120)Best iPad deals Why we like itCheck out Mashable's full review of the iPad mini.If you know you'll mostly use your iPad to watch shows, videos, and read, you should seriously consider the iPad mini. Clocking in at 8.3 inches, this aptly named tablet is easy to hold in your hand for long periods of time, making it an especially great option for someone who wants an e-reader with some versatility (or with vibrant colors). Even though it's not powered by Apple's latest chipset, it doesn't need to be for more casual usage. For anyone who doesn't need a tablet as powerful as a laptop, this ultraportable choice is well worth considering. Don't forget to add an Apple Pencil to your cart to get the most out of your new tablet. Apple Pencil deals 10 hours ago | July 10, 2025 While we've been hyping up Amazon's deal on the newly released M4 MacBook Air for weeks (seriously, it's a really good deal), that's not the lowest price you can find on MacBook Air laptops. It's got lots of the same tech, but with an all-around cooler vibe. Beats products also connect more easily with Android devices. For Prime Day, day three, we found record-low prices on new and old Beats products alike.Case in point: the new Beats Powerbeats Pro 2 Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds with a built-in heart rate monitor are marked down a new low price for Prime Day 2025. 13 hours ago | July 10, 2025 MacBooks are even cheaper on the third day of Prime Day: You read that right. MacBooks are down in price again:Apple MacBook Air, 13-inch (M4, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD) â€” $1,247 $1,399 (save $152) â€” $2 cheaperApple MacBook Pro, 14-inch (M4 Pro, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD) â€” $1,787.50 $1,999 (save $211.50) â€” $11.50 cheaperApple MacBook Pro, 16-inch (M4 Pro, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD) â€” $2,234 $2,499 (save $265) â€” $15 cheaperApple MacBook Pro, 16-inch (M4 Pro, 48GB RAM, 512GB SSD) â€” $2,587.50 $2,899 (save $311.50) â€” $11.50 cheaperApple MacBook Pro, 16-inch (M4 Max, 48GB RAM, 1TB SSD) â€” $3,557.50 $3,999 (save $441.50) â€” $38.49 cheaper 13 hours ago | July 10, 2025 iPad Air: My favorite Prime Day Apple deal is still live â€” get the lowest-ever price on the iPad Air.As of July 10, the 11-inch iPad Air (M3) is on sale for $479 in Prime Day 2025. That's the lowest-ever price according to price tracker camelcamelcamel. In our review of the iPad Air, we said it's the "best buy" for most Apple shoppers. The "best buy" at a record-low price? What are you waiting for?Get this deal here. 15 hours ago | July 10, 2025 AirPods 4: Prime Day deals are still going strong, and the discounts this year are on another level. There are plenty of deals to be had across the new four-day event, but we can't help but spotlight this latest deal on the Apple AirPods 4 with ANC, now at their lowest-ever price.As of July 10, you can buy these AirPods for $119. But if you're not fussed on noise cancellation, you can get the standard AirPods 4 for under $100.Read more here. 16 hours ago | July 10, 2025 Apple Watch Series 10: As of July 10, the Apple Watch 10 is on sale for $279 at Amazon. That's a savings of 30% on the list price, and the lowest-ever price. Bethany Allard is a Los Angeles-based shopping reporter at Mashable covering beauty tech, dating, sex and relationships, and headphones. That basically means she puts her hair through a lot, scrolls through a lot of dating apps, and rotates through a lot of different headphones. In addition to testing out and rounding up the best products, she also covers deals for Mashable, paying an especially obsessive amount of attention to Apple deals and prices. That knowledge comes in handy when she's covering shopping holidays like Prime Day and Black Friday, which she's now done for three years at Mashable.
html:
Credit: Mashable Photo Composite / Apple / Ian Moore

Table of Contents

The best Prime Day Apple deals at a glance:

Happy Prime Day!

While Amazon sales don't always live up to the hype, for Prime Day 2025, Amazon went hard. And that's especially true if you're an Apple loyalist, as tons of Apple products are now at or near record-low prices.

On the third day of the members-only sale, you can get AirPods starting at just $89. You can score the latest AirPods Pro for $149. The popular Apple Watch Series 10 and the 11-inch iPad are marked down to $279.99. And you can get a four-pack of AirTags for $64.99 just in time for the summer travel season.

Remember: this year, Prime Day continues through Friday, July 11 â€”Â making this the longest Prime Day ever â€” and we'll be keeping a close eye on Apple prices the whole way through. However, don't wait too long to shop â€”Â the $399 AirPods Max deal is already sold out.

Read on for our running guide to the best Prime Day Apple deals. And if our discount hunters spot a better deal on Apple products at Best Buy or Walmart, we'll be sure to let you know. Finally, deals marked with a ðŸ”¥ are at a record-low price.

Best MacBook deals

Why we like it

Check out our full review of the M4 MacBook Air.

Even at full price, the M4 MacBook Air is an impressively good value, especially considering its brand. For anyone who doesn't need the heavier specs of the Pro (and the additional literal weight that comes along with that), the Air is a great machine. It can handle audio and someÂ video editing, most tasks students will need it for, and general day-to-day tasks with ease.

At $150 off, the 13-inch Air with 16GB of RAM and 256GB of storage offers an especially good value. It's a price point that might be bested later this week in favor of the $829 record-low price we saw it briefly hit in late-June. But even if it doesn't, this current deal is still a great one to pick up.

MacBook Air deals

  • Apple MacBook Air, 13-inch (M1, 8GB, 256GB SSD) â€” $599 $649 (save $50) ðŸ”¥

  • Apple MacBook Air, 15-inch (M4, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD) â€”Â $1,049 $1,199 (save $150)

  • Apple MacBook Air, 13-inch (M4, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD) â€” $1,245.50 $1,399 (save $153.50)

  • Apple MacBook Air, 15-inch (M4, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD) â€” $1,249 $1,399 (save $150)

  • Apple MacBook Air, 15-inch (M4, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD) â€” $1,428 $1,599 (save $171)

  • Apple MacBook Pro, 14-inch (M4 Pro, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD) â€” $1,779 $1,999 (save $220)

  • Apple MacBook Pro, 16-inch (M4 Pro, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD) â€” $2,232.50 $2,499 (save $266.50)

  • Apple MacBook Pro, 16-inch (M4 Pro, 48GB RAM, 512GB SSD) â€” $2,587.50 $2,899 (save $311.50)

  • Apple MacBook Pro, 14-inch (M4 Max, 36GB RAM, 1TB SSD) â€” $2,874.21 $3,199 (save $324.79)

  • Apple MacBook Pro, 16-inch (M4 Max, 36GB RAM, 1TB SSD) â€” $3,117.50 $3,499 (save $381.50)

  • Apple MacBook Pro, 16-inch (M4 Max, 48GB RAM, 1TB SSD) â€” $3,557.50 $3,999 (save $441.50)

More Mac deals

  • Apple Mac mini (M4, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD) â€” $499.99 $599 (save $99.01 with on-page coupon)

Why we like it

Check out our full review of the Apple Watch Series 10.

The Apple Watch Series 10 frequently gets discounted at Amazon, but it's never dipped to $279.99 before â€” this is a new record-low price. It's an excellent deal on our favorite smartwatch fitness tracker, especially if you're already deep in the Apple ecosystem.

Though it's missing a blood oxygen sensor, it still works as a pedometer, heart rate monitor, sleep tracker, menstrual cycle tracker, and wrist temperature monitor, to name just a few of its functions. Its ultra-lightweight design doesn't sacrifice a larger display that makes reading all those metrics as easy as possible.

Apple Watch Ultra deals

  • Apple Watch Ultra 2 (49mm, GPS + cellular) â€” $649.99 $799 (save $149.01) ðŸ”¥

Apple Watch Series 10 deals

  • Apple Watch Series 10 (46mm, GPS) â€” $309 $429 (save $120) ðŸ”¥

  • Apple Watch Series 10, Milanese loop (42mm, GPS + cellular) â€” $629.99 $749 (save $119.01)

Apple Watch SE deals

  • Apple Watch SE, 2nd Gen (40mm, GPS) â€” $169 $249 (save $80)

  • Apple Watch SE, 2nd Gen (44mm, GPS) â€” $199 $279 (save $80)

The best AirPods Prime Day deal

Why we like it

Check out our full review of the Apple AirPods Pro.

Mashable Deals

For Apple fans, we have a can't-miss AirPods Prime Day deal. Even with the many noise-cancelling earbuds options on the market, the AirPods Pro remain one of the best choices for folks in the Apple ecosystem. The quick pairing can't be beat, and they are a true plug-and-play option (especially because they don't come with a companion app). The noise cancelling is some of the best you'll find on earbuds, alongside its excellent audio. Mashable's Stan Schroeder gave these earbuds a 4.1/5 in his review, noting that he'd be likely to take them on a plane over over-ear headphones, and writing of their sound "[they] did an equally good job with complex jazz performances and very heavy guitar tunes."

More AirPods deals

  • Apple AirPods 4 â€” $89 $129 (save $40) ðŸ”¥

  • Apple AirPods Max (Lightning) â€” $398 $549 (save $151)

  • Apple AirPods Max (USB-C) â€” $429 $549 (save $120)

Best iPad deals

Why we like it

Check out Mashable's full review of the iPad mini.

If you know you'll mostly use your iPad to watch shows, videos, and read, you should seriously consider the iPad mini. Clocking in at 8.3 inches, this aptly named tablet is easy to hold in your hand for long periods of time, making it an especially great option for someone who wants an e-reader with some versatility (or with vibrant colors). Even though it's not powered by Apple's latest chipset, it doesn't need to be for more casual usage.

For anyone who doesn't need a tablet as powerful as a laptop, this ultraportable choice is well worth considering. And at just $379, the iPad mini has hit a new all-time low this Prime Day.

Best Beats deals

Why we like it

Beats is an Apple brand, and it offers a lot of the same technology as your favorite AirPods (some of the same processors, instant connectivity with iPhones and Macs) but at a much lower price point. In the headphones category, we can't resist this 51% discount on the Beats Studio Pro cans. They offer lossless audio, active noise cancellation, and all-day battery life, not to mention a cool design with skin-tone colorways. And if you prefer earbuds, the best Beats wireless earbuds are also on sale.

Bethany Allard is a Los Angeles-based shopping reporter at Mashable covering beauty tech, dating, sex and relationships, and headphones. That basically means she puts her hair through a lot, scrolls through a lot of dating apps, and rotates through a lot of different headphones. In addition to testing out and rounding up the best products, she also covers deals for Mashable, paying an especially obsessive amount of attention to Apple deals and prices. That knowledge comes in handy when she's covering shopping holidays like Prime Day and Black Friday, which she's now done for three years at Mashable.
